sourcesContent:
import { Component ,inject,OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { Course } from 'src/app/Models/course'; import { CourseService } from 'src/app/Services/course.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-course-detail', templateUrl: './course-detail.component.html', styleUrls: ['./course-detail.component.css'] }) export class CourseDetailComponent implements OnInit{ selectedCourse:Course; courseId:number; courseService:CourseService = inject(CourseService); activeRoute:ActivatedRoute = inject(ActivatedRoute); ngOnInit(){ //take id from params to transfer in courseId // this.courseId = this.activeRoute.snapshot.params['id'] //+ use to convert string to number this.courseId = +this.activeRoute.snapshot.paramMap.get('id') this.selectedCourse = this.courseService.courses.find(course => course.id === this.courseId) } }
